name: RPG Fanatic Earth
description:
SPECIAL PRICE
38% OFF(USD 7.99 -> USD 4.99)!!!

Expose and bring down a corporate giant in this futuristic RPG!

In a world where an alien bacteria known as the "Achratoth" nearly wiped out mankind, Xilleon City was created using a particle shield to protect many of the remaining inhabitants. Somewhere in this sprawling metropolis, a man without a past happens upon a woman being harassed by thugs from the local gang. After this unsuspecting hero rescues her from her predicament, she decides to thank him and also seek his advice about a much more serious problem...

Join forces with a detective in the local police force, an android, and a young girl with a mysterious past as "defenders of justice" and take on Cyphatek, the largest corporation in Xilleon City, to expose their corruption!

An Original Sci-Fi RPG
For any lover of futuristic games, this one is sure to please! Androids, robots, and cyber prosthetics are just a few of the technologies one can expect to encounter in the vast and ever-changing landscape that serves as the stage for Fanatic Earth!

Chains
In battle, consecutive hits are known as "chains". These raise damage in proportion to the hit-count. Experience and money also increase according to this number. When attacking with skills, there is a chance the target enemy will be stunned. In such a case, the same attack can be repeated with a slight increase in damage, SP is halved, and charge time is completely eliminated. Using this pattern is the best way to deal out heavy amounts of damage, quickly level up, and earn money to outfit the party with new equipment.

Cores
These are a type of equipment with parameter enhancing and special effects. They are available for purchase at local shops, found in treasure chests, etc. A maximum of two can be equipped at any given time, some even allowing for multiplied effects with tremendous results.

*This game features some in-app-purchase content. While in-app-purchase content requires additional fees, by no means it is necessary for finishing the game.
*The actual price might differ depending on the region.
